headline: Arista Networks Delivers Strong Q2 Results as Price Target Rises Despite Headwinds
summary: Arista Networks Inc (NYSE:ANET) is one of the 12 High-Risk High-Reward Growth Stocks to Buy Right Now. The company’s price target is raised amid a strong Q2 performance and while facing headwinds. Released on August 5, 2025, Arista Networks Inc (NYSE:ANET)’s Q2 earnings report revealed a revenue of $2.2 billion, a 30.4% year-over-year increase. At […]

headline: Where is Arista Networks (ANET) Headed According to Analysts?
summary: Arista Networks, Inc. (NYSE:ANET) is one of the best stocks to invest in right now. On September 15, William Blair analyst Sebastien Naji reiterated a bullish stance on Arista Networks, Inc. (NYSE:ANET), giving the stock a Buy rating. UBS analyst David Vogt also expressed bullish sentiments for the stock, giving it a Buy rating with […]
